name: MavenCache
description: Azure DevOps task for Maven cache inside an Azure storage account.
author: Julien Hagestedt

inputs.name: storageName
inputs.label: Storage name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of your Azure Storage Account.

inputs.name: storageKey
inputs.label: Storage key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Access key of your Azure Storage Account.

inputs.name: storageContainer
inputs.label: Storage container
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the container inside your Azure Storage Account. If container is not present it will be created.
